ai-tha-ap75:1.3_0: Then after arranging their hands in respectful salutation,
ai-tha-ap75:2.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap75:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap75:2.4_0: this fruit is the perception of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap75:3.1_0: have been set out from here.

ai-tha-ap75:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap75:6.1_0: (Once) the Elder Nun Paccekabuddhas, third (and said):
